shortdesc.ph: Retrieves the mixed captured and playback audio frame.
Retrieves the mixed captured and playback audio frame.

p.note: @note This callback only returns the single-channel data. @note This callback only returns the single-channel data.

plentry.pd: Mix Raw Audio Mix Raw Audio See . See .

ul.li: : Valid buffer in AudioFrame, and the captured audio frame is sent out. : Valid buffer in AudioFrame, and the captured audio frame is sent out.
: Invalid buffer in AudioFrame, and the captured audio frame is discarded. : Invalid buffer in AudioFrame, and the captured audio frame is discarded.
